SqlQuery:
SELECT 
 h.ElementID AS ID, 
 h.Path AS PATH , 
 h.Name AS NAME, 
 h.Level AS LEVEL 
 FROM 
  Asset.ElementHierarchy h 
 WHERE 
 h.Level = [Param.1] 
  ORDER BY  
 h.Path+h.Name ASC
SqlQuery_1:
SELECT 
 h.ElementID AS ID, 
 h.Path AS PATH , 
 h.Name AS NAME, 
 h.Level AS LEVEL AND NULL 
 FROM 
  Asset.ElementHierarchy h 
 WHERE 
 h.Level = [Param.1] 
  ORDER BY  
 h.Path+h.Name ASC
SqlQuery_2:
SELECT 
 h.ElementID AS ID, 
 h.Path AS PATH , 
 h.Name AS NAME, 
 h.Level AS LEVEL , 
 h.Level AS TEST 
 FROM 
  Asset.ElementHierarchy h 
 WHERE 
 h.Level = [Param.1] 
  ORDER BY  
 h.Path+h.Name ASC
SqlQuery_3:
SELECT 
 e.ID AS EQUIPMENT_ID, 
 ef.Name as RECIPE_NAME, 
 eft.Name AS EventFrameTemplateName, 
 ef.StartTime AS START_DATE, 
 ef.EndTime AS END_DATE, 
 e.Name AS EQUIPMENT_NAME, 
 efs.Value AS BATCH_ID 
 FROM 
 EventFrame.EventFrame ef 
 INNER JOIN 
 EventFrame.EventFrameTemplate eft 
 on ef.EventFrameTemplateID = eft.ID 
 INNER JOIN 
 EventFrame.EventFrameAttribute efa 
 on efa.EventFrameID = ef.ID 
 INNER JOIN 
 Data.EventFrameSnapshot efs 
 ON efs.EventFrameAttributeID = efa.ID 
 INNER JOIN Asset.Element e ON e.ID = ef.PrimaryReferencedElementID 
 WHERE (ef.StartTime BETWEEN [SD] AND [ED] OR ef.EndTime BETWEEN [SD] AND [ED]) 
 AND efa.Name = 'Batch Name'
